array.string: My name is Matheus, I was born in 1995, which gives me almost 20 years lived.

dict.string: I live in Brazil, Rio Grande do Sul, in a city called Gravataí.

array.string: When I was 16 I got to a Technical School. When I finished the course I knew more than ever what I wanted for life: solve people problems with what I can.

dict.string: In 2014 I started study Computer Science at Universidade Luterana do Brasil (ULBRA) at Canoas.
And finally, at the current year I started the Brazilian Educational Program for iOS Development (BEPiD), at the PUCRS in Porto Alegre.

array.string: I started developing apps for iOS at February, in the current year, and since then i'm living iOS.
I started developing apps with Objective-C. I only started developing with Swift at the end of March. This is my first App using Swift.
I'm focusing in projects that can make me reach the wish of my childhood: help people with their problems with what I can.
Currently I'm in two projects. They're going to be my first apps at AppStore.

dict.string: One app is called MOG. The app is meant to help people to organize and manage their soccer games.
The other app is called Colaborê. The app is meant to help people to share and know about the problems in some location.
